about_the_game:
Run-Gunners’ Revenge is a 3D 3rd/1st person, retro inspired, action platformer shooter.

Features

  • Non-linear intricate dungeon style level-design
  • Collect keys, unlock doors and gates for progression
  • Level specific puzzles and challenges
  • Varied enemies that require adaptive strategies
  • 3D platforming/combat
  • Intense boss battles
  • Open world sections
  • Innovative point based system for saves, upgrades, and items
  • Treasure hunting, point based, economic system
  • Satisfying environmental interaction

Description

Run-Gunners' Revenge is a thrilling game that seamlessly blends retro-style gameplay with modern mechanics. You play as REX, the last member of an elite military class, the legendary Run-Gunners. You find yourself imprisoned by a tyrannical occupying force. Armed with an arsenal of weapons and abilities, you must jump, shoot, and fight your way through a series of challenging levels, including dungeons, forests, deserts, and underwater environments.


In addition to its action-packed gameplay, Run-Gunners' Revenge also features dungeon-style levels that require you to use keys to unlock doors and gates, as well as level-specific puzzles that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. The game also includes open-world sections, which allow you to explore and discover new areas at your own pace.

The game's retro-style 3D graphics and colorful landscapes provide a stunning backdrop for your adventure. As you progress through the game, defeating enemies aquiring points and upgrading your gear, you will face increasingly complex enemies and bosses, each with their own unique abilities and challenges. With its exciting gameplay, challenging puzzles, and engaging story-line, Run-Gunners' Revenge is a must-play for fans of retro-inspired 3D platformer shooters.

name: Run-Gunners' Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX /AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Run-Gunners’ Revenge is a 3rd/1st person, retro inspired, action platformer shooter, Where you, REX, last survivor of the elite legendary Run-Gunners, enact revenge against a tyrannical occupying force, by blasting and platforming your way through hordes of formidable enemies.
